item.title: Abondened MINI on slip road which is a danger, 8th October
item.description:
Resident reporting there is a Silver Mini left on the slip road for over 2 weeks and no one has come to claim it. It is on a very dangerous spot as all vehicles use this slip road. Please could someone look into this asap
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Cray Road, North Cray, London

item.title: Rubbish bags left next to street bins which get torn open and spread litter everywhere, 8th October
item.description:
This is an ongoing problem which looks like domestic rubbish possible from flats above shops putting rubbish out next to street bin this then gets torn open and spreads rubbish along Westmount Rd SE9. It’s a health hazard and an eyesore

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 150B,150E, Westmount Road, Well Hall, London

item.title: BT Manhole Cover - Loose Fitting, 8th October
item.description:
Adjacent to 379 Bellegrove Road. Loose fitting BT cover is rattling when vehicles go over it. I am aware of local concerns about road surface noise and suspect that this is the principal cause.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bellegrove Road, Falconwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet
